prompts.text:
Pick a color.
Go towards it.

Pick a building
in the distance.
Go towards it.
Follow a red vehicle.

Step on cracks
in the pavement.
Go east for three blocks.

Flip a coin.
Heads means turn left,
tails means turn right.
Walk without a direction.
Look for rhyming signs.

Turn left or right.
It's a free world.
Turn whenever you reach a red light.

When a street name
starts with a vowel,
turn left.
Find an interesting tree.
Look at the chimneys.

Find a fancy car.
Go in the direction it's wheels are pointing.

Find shade.
Observe and enjoy it.

Find a place to
sit for five minutes.
Watch.

At the next opportunity,
turn right.

Stop and listen.
Follow that sound.

Pick any direction.
Go straight for
five blocks.
Go towards laughter.

Wave and smile
at the next
surveillance camera.

Head in the
noisiest direction.

web.text:
What is this area know for?
Find the opposite.
